meta.title: CatalogSummary - Models - API Reference
meta.description: A BigCommerce Catalog Summary object describes a lightweight summary of the catalog.

blocks.data: A BigCommerce Catalog Summary object describes a lightweight summary of the catalog.

inventory_count.description: A count of all inventory items in the catalog.

primary_category_id.description: ID of the category containing the most products.

primary_category_name.description: Name of the category containing the most products.
